articles.author: Hanna Ziady
articles.title: UK inflation slows to 6.8% but services are getting even more expensive - CNN
articles.description: UK inflation eased to a 17-month low in July, official data showed Wednesday, though it also revealed that prices of services, such as haircuts, hotels and restaurants, increased at a faster pace than the previous month.
